overview: Assunta Spina is a very attractive and passionate young, the only one that can read and write among all workers in the laundry room of Do√±a Rosa. She is married to a sailor who will be to the sea and will leave it. Then fall into the arms of Michele, a butcher who has always felt an uncontrollable, primitive passion towards her. But the passion and jealousy between the two love will be unbearable.
title: Assunta Spina
